MSNBC “AM Joy” host Joy Reid started off a segment Saturday talking about Sen. Dianne Feinstein (D-CA), who she said “heroically” released Fusion GPS co-founder Glenn Simpson’s testimony without notifying Senate Judiciary Committee chairman Sen. Chuck Grassley (R-IA).
“I want to start by playing Senator Dianne Feinstein, who I think a lot of Americans believe rather heroically went ahead and released this testimony,” said Reid.
